tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE solo_traveler_expenses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    expense_date DATE,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE traveler_expenses (
    expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    traveler_id INT,
    expense_description TEXT,
    expense_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    expense_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (traveler_id) REFERENCES solo_travelers(traveler_id)
);

CREATE TABLE expenses (
  expense_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  expense_name TEXT,
  expense_amount DECIMAL,
  expense_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE budgets (
  budget_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  budget_name TEXT,
  budget_amount DECIMAL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE trips (
  trip_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  trip_name TEXT,
  travel_date DATE,
  destination TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE solo_travelers_expenses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trip_name VARCHAR(255),
    expense_date DATE,
    expense_description TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE solo_travelers_budgets (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trip_name VARCHAR(255),
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE solo_travelers_categories (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE solo_travelers_expense_categories (
    expense_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (expense_id, category_id)
)

CREATE TABLE trips (
  trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  traveler_id INT,
  destination VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE expenses (
  expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trip_id INT,
  expense_date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
